snippet: A legal battle involving investors and Argentina highlights a growing problem in countries that fall on hard times.
abstract: Editorial observes that legal battle between investors and Argentina over country's refusal to pay off its debts reflects rising tide of litigation involving countries that fall on hard times; contends that nations worldwide must develop a more systematic way to deal with sovereign defaults.
lead_paragraph: A legal battle involving investors and Argentina highlights a growing problem in countries that fall on hard times.
